external_games.name: Frame of Mind: A game of Thoughts
Frame of Mind - A game of thoughts.

name: Frame of Mind: A game of Thoughts
storyline: Discover a character as they first move out of their parents house. What mementos will they find? What thoughts will they want to keep? Can they be happy? Maybe not. But you can help them find a better Frame of Mind.
summary: Frame of Mind is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you discover a character trough thoughts and mementos they find while moving out of their parents home. It's an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the developer, had growing up.
